import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import {connect} from "react-redux" import {addEmployee} from '../../redux/actions/employeeAct' const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ title: 'Add New Employee', employee: {}, }); function EmployeeForm(props) { const {title, employee, addEmployee} = props const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm({defaultValue: employee}) const onSubmit = (data) => { console.log(data); addEmployee(data) } return (
{title}

Birthday

Maneger v ? parseInt(v) : null })} /> {/* */}
Wage Rate v ? parseInt(v) : null })} /> {/* */}
Department v ? parseInt(v) : null })} /> {/* */}
Active Employee
) } EmployeeForm.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string, employee: PropTypes.object, listEmp: PropTypes.array.isRequired, addEmployee: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } EmployeeForm.defaultProps = { title: '', employee: {}, listEmp: [], addEmployee: null, } export default connect(mapStateToProps,{addEmployee})(EmployeeForm)
